name: DessertWars
description:
Sasha has been accepted to the DessertWars, and with the help of her cousin (and you), she'll be the winner!

Did i said that Sasha also haves a talking hairclip?

Features:

❤Minigames, which you need to finish on the right time and with the required score.

❤Visual novel with pixel-like graphics.

❤Lifes, which can be decreased for failing on Minigames, if all lives are taken off, you'll be eliminated (get a GameOver).

(this is an entry for the Food Jam on GameJolt, but it hasn't voted like the other entries, i'm posting here in case someone here wants it, heh)

"Root" by Silent Partner.
